data.name: Trash Magnate
data.detailed_description:
Trash Magnate is a lighthearted recycling rpg. As a young entrepreneur it is your task to balance personal wealth, pollution, and public opinion while building your waste management empire. Decisions must be made how to deal with your town's accumulating garbage. Every decision has a trade off -- so be sure to make the choices that help your budding business bloom.

Start from the bottom -- collecting tidbits of waste from garbage bins around the neighborhood and expand own waste management in the entire city.
data.about_the_game:
Trash Magnate is a lighthearted recycling rpg. As a young entrepreneur it is your task to balance personal wealth, pollution, and public opinion while building your waste management empire. Decisions must be made how to deal with your town's accumulating garbage. Every decision has a trade off -- so be sure to make the choices that help your budding business bloom.

Start from the bottom -- collecting tidbits of waste from garbage bins around the neighborhood and expand own waste management in the entire city.
data.short_description: An open world recycling tycoon game. Explore the 3d environment collecting garbage and converting it to raw resources. Complete quests and unlock upgrades as you expand your waste management empire.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8250U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
